question: Which country passed the S.386 Bill to withdraw country caps on employment-based green cards?
explanation: The US Senate  passed the S386 Bill or the ‘Fairness for High-Skilled Immigrants Act’ to remove country-caps on the employment-based green cards. This will be beneficial for 7.4 lakh Indians who were immensely waiting for a green card. The bill banishes the 7% country cap for employment-based immigrant visas.
